scripts.android:dev: adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081 && react-native run-android
scripts.android:one: concurrently -k -n metro,android "react-native start" "wait-on http://localhost:8081/status && react-native run-android"
scripts.android:win: cmd /c "if not exist C:\Temp mkdir C:\Temp && set TMP=C:\Temp && set TEMP=C:\Temp && npx react-native run-android"
scripts.ios:clean: cd ios && rm -rf Pods build && rm -f Podfile.lock && cd .. && (rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* ~/Library/Caches/com.apple.dt.Xcode/* 2>/dev/null || true) && cd ios && pod install && cd ..
scripts.start:clear:force: lsof -ti:8081 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; react-native start --reset-cache
scripts.clear-cache: rm -rf node_modules/.cache /tmp/metro-* /tmp/haste-* 2>/dev/null; echo 'Cache cleared. Use npm run start:clear to start Metro with a fresh cache.'
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules/.cache /tmp/metro-* /tmp/haste-* 2>/dev/null; watchman watch-del-all 2>/dev/null; echo 'Caches cleared. For Xcode: cd ios && xcodebuild clean'
